academic.description: A university-related database that tracks academic departments, courses, professors, and students.

tables.professor: Stores information about professors, including their department and personal details.
tables.department: Contains departments within the university, each with a unique ID and name.
tables.student: Holds records of students enrolled in the university.
tables.course: Lists courses offered by departments, including course names and descriptions.
tables.section: Defines individual course sections, usually tied to a specific semester or time slot.
tables.teaches: Maps professors to the courses they teach.
tables.takes: Links students to the courses they are taking.
tables.classroom: Lists available classrooms including room numbers and capacities.
tables.time_slot: Details time slots used for course scheduling.

activity_1.description: Tracks a variety of personal activities such as reading, dancing, and exercising.

tables.activity: Defines activity categories like reading, dancing, or exercising.
tables.person: Contains information about individuals performing activities.
tables.activity_participation: Maps people to the activities they participate in, including timestamps and duration.

aircraft.description: A database tracking aircraft models, airlines, and flight-related data.

tables.aircraft: Stores aircraft models, types, and manufacturing info.
tables.flight: Records flight data including aircraft used and airline.

allergy_1.description: A medical database focused on patient allergies and treatments.

tables.patients: Stores patient records including names and contact details.
tables.patient_allergies: Maps patients to their specific allergies.
tables.prescriptions: Links patients to prescribed medications for their allergies.

apartment_rentals.description: A real estate database focused on apartment listings, features, and leases.

tables.apartment: Details each apartment unit including size and location.
tables.landlord: Stores information about landlords managing apartments.
tables.features: Lists features like parking or gym access.
tables.lease: Captures rental agreements between tenants and landlords.

architecture.description: Contains information about architects, architectural styles, and buildings.

tables.architect: Stores data about architects including name and nationality.
tables.building: Details buildings and the architects who designed them.
tables.building_style: Maps buildings to the styles they represent.

assets_maintenance.description: Tracks assets owned by a company and their maintenance history.

tables.asset: Stores information about assets such as computers, vehicles, etc.
tables.maintenance: Details maintenance actions performed on assets.
tables.technician: Lists technicians responsible for maintaining assets.

baseball_1.description: A sports database for tracking professional baseball teams, players, and statistics.

tables.team: Stores team details such as location and name.
tables.game: Records games played including teams and scores.
tables.statistic: Details player statistics for specific games.

battle_death.description: A historical database documenting battles, involved parties, and casualties.

tables.battle: Stores historical battle events including name, year, and location.
tables.country: Lists countries that participated in battles.
tables.casualties: Details the number of deaths per country in each battle.

behavior_monitoring.description: A behavioral tracking database for monitoring student conduct in schools.

tables.student: Holds student records including names and class info.
tables.teacher: Stores information about teachers who may report incidents.
tables.incident_report: Associates incidents with the reporting teacher and student.

bike_1.description: A database for a bike rental service that tracks bikes, users, and usage.

tables.bike: Contains data on each bike available for rent.
tables.user: Stores user information including contact details.
tables.rental: Records bike rentals including duration and timestamps.

body_builder.description: Tracks information about bodybuilders and their competition results.

tables.bodybuilder: Stores details like name, nationality, and weight class.
tables.competition: Lists bodybuilding competitions and their locations.
tables.results: Records placements of bodybuilders in competitions.

book_2.description: A library-like database that tracks books, authors, and book categories.

tables.book: Contains book details like title, publish year, and author.
tables.author: Stores author names and additional info.
tables.category: Defines genres or categories like fiction, history, etc.
tables.book_category: Maps books to their respective categories.

browser_web.description: Tracks web browsers, websites, users, and browsing sessions.

tables.user: Stores details about users including age and location.
tables.visit: Records visit sessions, including time and browser used.

candidate_poll.description: A database for tracking political candidates and polling results.

tables.candidate: Stores candidate names, political parties, and details.
tables.poll: Contains polling event information including date and location.
tables.poll_result: Maps candidates to their polling results in each poll.

car_1.description: A database related to vehicles, their types, and ownership records.

tables.car: Stores car information including model, year, and owner.
tables.car_type: Defines categories for cars such as sedan or SUV.
tables.person: Contains personal data for individuals who own cars.

chinook_1.description: A music sales database with customers, invoices, and tracks.

tables.track: Lists music tracks, including genre and length.
tables.media_type: Specifies the type of media (e.g., MPEG, AAC).
tables.invoice_line: Contains details for each item on an invoice.
tables.customer: Stores customer contact and billing information.

cinema.description: Tracks movies, films, directors, and actors in a cinema database.

tables.movie: Stores movie titles and release dates.
tables.director: Lists directors and their associated movies.
tables.movie_actor: Links actors to the movies they appear in.

city_record.description: A municipal database tracking city demographics, facilities, and events.

tables.city: Stores city-level information such as population and region.
tables.facility: Lists facilities available in each city (e.g., schools, hospitals).
tables.event: Tracks public events held in various cities.

climbing.description: Stores information about climbing competitions, participants, and scores.

tables.climber: Contains details about each climber, including nationality.
tables.competition: Lists climbing competitions and their dates.
tables.score: Tracks the performance scores of climbers in competitions.

club_1.description: A social club database with member data, activities, and roles.

tables.member: Stores member names and contact details.
tables.activity: Lists club activities like sports or events.
tables.member_activity: Links members to the activities they participate in.
tables.position: Defines roles held by members within the club (e.g., president).

coffee_shop.description: Tracks coffee shop orders, customers, and menu items.

tables.menu_item: Lists drinks and food items available.
tables.customer: Stores customer names and loyalty info.
tables.order_item: Maps each order to the menu items it includes.

college_1.description: A database for college course offerings, enrollment, and instructors.

tables.student: Stores student names, IDs, and majors.
tables.enrollment: Links students to the courses they are enrolled in.
tables.instructor: Lists instructors and the courses they teach.

college_2.description: Another college database focused on prerequisites and course structure.

tables.course: Stores course codes, titles, and credits.
tables.time_slot: Defines the time slots for course offerings.
tables.teaches: Maps instructors to specific courses and sections.
tables.takes: Links students to the courses they are taking.

college_3.description: A university database modeling students, courses, and registration records.

tables.student: Contains student info including ID, name, and major.
tables.registration: Tracks which students are registered for which courses.

company_1.description: Tracks departments, employees, and projects within a company.

tables.department: Contains company departments including name and manager.
tables.project: Lists ongoing projects and associated departments.
tables.works_on: Maps employees to the projects they work on.

company_employee.description: A simplified HR database tracking employee positions and pay.

tables.employee: Lists employees and their personal info.
tables.position: Defines job roles and pay rates.
tables.employee_position: Maps employees to their job roles.

company_office.description: Tracks office locations, departments, and employee assignments.

tables.department: Lists departments and their assigned office.
tables.employee: Links employees to the departments and offices they work in.

concert_singer.description: This database records musical concerts and the singers who performed in them. It captures information about individual singers, concert events, and their associations.

tables.singer: Stores personal details about each singer, including their name, country, age, gender, and the song they are known for.
tables.concert: Contains data about each concert event, such as the concert name, its theme, the stadium it took place in, and the year it occurred.
tables.singer_in_concert: A relationship table that links singers to the concerts they performed in.

county_public_safety.description: A county-level database tracking fire stations, police departments, and incidents.

tables.county: Contains counties and general info like name and population.
tables.fire_station: Lists fire stations and their locations.
tables.incident: Details public safety incidents and locations.
tables.response: Links fire and police response teams to incidents.

course_teach.description: Models university teaching, course offerings, and student registration.

tables.professor: Lists professors by department and contact info.
tables.teaches: Maps professors to the courses they teach.
tables.takes: Links students to the courses they are taking.

cre_Doc_Control_Systems.description: Tracks documents within an organization's control system, including who created or modified them.

tables.document: Stores metadata about each document including title, type, and creation date.
tables.employee: Contains information about employees who create or manage documents.
tables.document_status: Tracks the status history of documents, including who changed it and when.

cre_Doc_Template_Mgt.description: Manages document templates used within an organization for consistency and reuse.

tables.template: Stores template names, types, and contents.
tables.employee: Tracks employees who create or manage templates.
tables.template_use: Logs instances where templates were used in documents.

cre_Doc_Tracking_DB.description: Tracks document movement and review workflows through departments and employees.

tables.document: Basic info about documents such as ID, title, and date created.
tables.department: Lists departments involved in document workflows.
tables.employee: Contains employee details and their associated departments.
tables.tracking_record: Logs the movement and status changes of documents.

cre_Docs_and_Epenses.description: A document and expense management system for tracking work items and their associated costs.

tables.document: Stores project-related documents with metadata and costs.
tables.employee: Tracks who created or is responsible for each document.
tables.expense: Contains expense records tied to specific documents or employees.

cre_Drama_Workshop_Groups.description: Manages workshop groups, their activities, and participant roles in a drama education setting.

tables.group: Stores drama workshop group names and details.
tables.activity: Lists activities such as rehearsals, acting sessions, or performances.
tables.group_activity: Links groups to the activities they engage in.
tables.participant_role: Defines each participant’s role in a group or activity.

cre_Theme_park.description: Tracks rides, maintenance, and staff within a theme park.

tables.ride: Stores ride names, types, and safety ratings.
tables.maintenance: Records maintenance checks and reports on rides.
tables.employee: Tracks staff responsible for operating or maintaining rides.
tables.ride_assignment: Maps employees to rides they operate or maintain.

csu_1.description: A college data system for tracking students, classes, majors, and advisors.

tables.student: Contains student names, IDs, and major details.
tables.major: Lists majors offered at the institution.
tables.class: Details course sections offered each term.
tables.enrollment: Links students to the classes they are enrolled in.
tables.advisor: Maps students to their academic advisors.

culture_company.description: A cultural organization database managing performances, venues, and artists.

tables.event: Stores cultural events and their descriptions.
tables.venue: Tracks venue locations and seating capacity.
tables.performance: Links events to artists and venues, along with performance times.

customer_complaints.description: Tracks customer complaints, resolution steps, and support staff involved.

tables.customer: Contains information about customers submitting complaints.
tables.complaint: Records complaint details including date and issue type.
tables.support_staff: Lists employees responsible for handling complaints.
tables.resolution: Links complaints to resolution steps and responsible staff.

customer_deliveries.description: A logistics-focused database tracking orders, shipments, and delivery staff.

tables.customer: Stores customer addresses and preferences.
tables.order: Contains customer orders including items and totals.
tables.delivery_staff: Lists drivers or couriers responsible for deliveries.
tables.delivery_record: Logs deliveries and whether they were completed.

customers_and_addresses.description: Maintains customer records and associated delivery or billing addresses.

tables.customer: Contains customer names and account info.
tables.customer_address: Links customers to their addresses (can be multiple per customer).

customers_and_invoices.description: Tracks invoices issued to customers including payment status and totals.

tables.customer: Stores customer information.
tables.invoice: Details issued invoices including date, total amount, and payment status.
tables.invoice_item: Breaks invoices down into specific billed items or services.

customers_and_products_contacts.description: Combines customer data with product preferences and communication history.

tables.customer: Contains personal and account information.
tables.contact: Logs calls or messages sent to customers.
tables.customer_product: Links customers to their preferred products.

customers_campaigns_ecommerce.description: Tracks marketing campaigns, customer responses, and related purchases in an ecommerce platform.

tables.customer: Stores customer demographic and account data.
tables.campaign: Details promotional campaigns like email or social media ads.
tables.purchase: Tracks products purchased and campaign effectiveness.

customers_card_transactions.description: Manages credit/debit card usage by customers including transactions and balances.

tables.customer: Contains customer account and card info.
tables.card: Stores card numbers, types, and issuing banks.
tables.transaction: Logs purchases and payments made using cards.
tables.merchant: Details merchants involved in each transaction.

debate.description: Tracks debate tournaments, participants, teams, and scores.

tables.tournament: Details each debate event, including name and date.
tables.team: Stores team names and associated information.
tables.participant: Contains debater names and contact info.
tables.team_participant: Links participants to their respective teams.
tables.match: Represents individual debate matches, including results.

decoration_competition.description: Manages decoration competitions and participant entries.

tables.competition: Lists competitions, their themes, and schedules.
tables.participant: Stores details of participants entering competitions.
tables.entry: Links participants to their competition entries and scores.

department_management.description: Manages departments, employees, and department leadership.

tables.department: Contains department names, IDs, and descriptions.
tables.employee: Stores employee names, positions, and department affiliations.
tables.manager: Defines managerial roles for each department.

department_store.description: Tracks inventory, sales, employees, and customers in a department store.

tables.product: Lists items sold including descriptions and pricing.
tables.employee: Stores employee roles and contact info.
tables.customer: Tracks customer data including purchases.
tables.sale: Represents completed transactions including total cost and items.
tables.department: Organizes products and employees into departments.

device.description: Tracks electronic devices, their specs, and customer orders.

tables.device: Details devices including brand, type, and features.
tables.customer: Stores customer contact info and order history.
tables.order: Records device orders made by customers.

document_management.description: Manages business documents, their versions, and authoring history.

tables.document: Stores document names, types, and creation dates.
tables.version: Represents document versions with associated changes.
tables.author: Details document authors and contributors.

dog_kennels.description: Manages dog boarding records, kennel assignments, and owners.

tables.dog: Stores dog names, breeds, and vaccination info.
tables.owner: Contains owner details and contact information.
tables.kennel: Tracks kennel units and their availability.
tables.boarding_record: Links dogs to their boarding history and assigned kennel.

dorm_1.description: Tracks student dormitories, rooms, and occupancy records.

tables.dorm: Lists dormitory buildings and their names.
tables.room: Tracks individual rooms, capacities, and availability.
tables.student: Contains information about students living in the dorm.
tables.occupancy: Links students to assigned dorm rooms and move-in dates.

driving_school.description: Manages driving school courses, instructors, and students.

tables.student: Tracks students enrolled in driving lessons.
tables.lesson: Represents driving lessons, including time and location.
tables.enrollment: Links students to their lesson schedules.

e_government.description: Models e-government services, citizens, and departments.

tables.citizen: Contains registered citizen profiles and IDs.
tables.service: Lists digital services offered (e.g., tax filing).
tables.department: Links services to the government departments offering them.
tables.request: Tracks citizen usage of government services.

e_learning.description: A learning management system for tracking courses, students, and progress.

tables.course: Stores course names, topics, and materials.
tables.student: Contains student records including enrollment dates.
tables.progress: Tracks student progress through course modules.

election.description: Tracks elections, candidates, polling stations, and votes.

tables.election: Represents election events and their dates.
tables.candidate: Stores candidate names and party affiliations.
tables.vote: Links votes to candidates and polling stations.

election_representative.description: Models representative elections, districts, and voter turnout.

tables.representative: Stores elected officials and their districts.
tables.district: Contains voting district names and demographics.

employee_hire_evaluation.description: Tracks job candidates, interview evaluations, and hiring decisions.

tables.candidate: Stores job candidate names and resumes.
tables.evaluator: Lists people responsible for evaluating candidates.
tables.evaluation: Stores scores or comments made by evaluators.

entertainment_awards.description: Tracks entertainment award shows, nominees, and wins.

tables.award_show: Contains award show names and years.
tables.category: Defines award categories like Best Actor or Best Film.

entrepreneur.description: Models startups, entrepreneurs, funding rounds, and investments.

tables.entrepreneur: Stores individuals founding or managing companies.
tables.startup: Lists startup names, domains, and founders.
tables.investor: Contains investors and venture capital firms.
tables.investment: Links investors to funded startups and amounts.

epinions_1.description: Tracks users, products, and written reviews on a consumer platform.

tables.user: Contains usernames and user reputation scores.
tables.review: Links users to the reviews they've written for products.
tables.rating: Records numerical ratings for reviewed items.

farm.description: Tracks farm operations, animals, crops, and worker roles.

tables.animal: Lists animals on the farm, including type and age.
tables.crop: Stores information on planted crops and harvests.
tables.task: Defines daily or seasonal tasks assigned to workers.

film_rank.description: Stores movie information and ranking scores from various sources.

tables.film: Contains film titles, release dates, and genres.
tables.rank_source: Defines review sources (e.g., IMDB, Rotten Tomatoes).
tables.ranking: Links films to scores from different ranking sources.

flight_1.description: Tracks flights, airports, and schedules for a single airline.

tables.airport: Contains airport codes, locations, and details.
tables.flight: Stores flight numbers, times, and destinations.
tables.aircraft: Describes aircraft used in each flight.
tables.crew: Tracks pilots and flight attendants assigned to flights.

flight_2.description: A detailed airline management system for routes, tickets, and flight legs.

tables.flight: Stores flight info including codes and routes.
tables.flight_leg: Divides flights into legs for multi-stop routes.
tables.ticket: Tracks passenger ticket info and seat assignments.

flight_4.description: Tracks multi-leg international flights with airline and delay tracking.

tables.flight: Contains flight details including duration and airline.
tables.airport: Stores information on all serviced airports.
tables.flight_segment: Breaks long flights into smaller segments.
tables.delay: Logs delays per segment and their reasons.

flight_company.description: Models a flight company’s operations including aircrafts, employees, and travel routes.

tables.aircraft: Describes each aircraft including model and capacity.
tables.employee: Tracks employees like pilots and staff.
tables.flight: Details flights assigned to aircraft and routes.

formula_1.description: A Formula 1 database tracking drivers, races, teams, and results.

tables.driver: Stores driver names, nationality, and racing number.
tables.race: Details races including track and location.
tables.result: Links drivers to race outcomes and positions.

game_1.description: Tracks video game information including developers, genres, and user platforms.

tables.game: Stores titles, release years, and ratings of video games.
tables.developer: Contains information about companies or individuals who created the games.
tables.genre: Defines game genres like RPG or shooter.
tables.platform: Lists platforms the games are available on, such as Xbox or PC.
tables.game_platform: Maps games to the platforms they are released on.

game_injury.description: Monitors sports-related injuries and affected players during games.

tables.game: Stores match information such as teams and dates.
tables.player: Contains data about players participating in games.
tables.injury: Details injuries sustained by players including type and recovery time.
tables.game_injury: Links injuries to specific games and players.

gas_company.description: Manages customer accounts, gas usage, and service requests for a utility provider.

tables.customer: Stores user accounts and contact information.
tables.meter: Tracks gas meters assigned to customers.
tables.usage: Logs monthly gas usage per meter.
tables.service_request: Tracks maintenance or service tickets requested by customers.

geo.description: Models geographical hierarchies including countries, regions, and cities.

tables.region: Defines regions and their corresponding countries.
tables.city: Tracks cities and their associated regions and populations.

gymnast.description: Tracks gymnasts, competitions, scores, and events they participate in.

tables.gymnast: Stores personal and competitive info about gymnasts.
tables.competition: Lists gymnastics competitions including date and location.
tables.event: Defines specific gymnastic events like vault or floor.
tables.score: Records gymnast scores for events during competitions.

hospital_1.description: Manages hospital departments, patients, staff, and appointments.

tables.department: Lists hospital departments such as cardiology or radiology.
tables.doctor: Tracks doctors and their department affiliations.
tables.patient: Stores patient records including name and contact.
tables.appointment: Logs scheduled appointments between patients and doctors.

hr_1.description: A human resources database tracking employees, departments, and salaries.

tables.employee: Stores employee names, IDs, and job titles.
tables.salary: Tracks employee salary history and pay grades.

icfp_1.description: A bibliographic database of research papers and authors for the ICFP conference.

tables.paper: Stores academic paper titles, abstracts, and publication years.
tables.author: Lists names and affiliations of authors.
tables.writes: Links authors to the papers they've written.
tables.citation: Represents paper citations referencing other papers.

imdb.description: A movie database similar to IMDb that includes films, people, genres, and ratings.

tables.movie: Stores film titles, years, and descriptions.
tables.actor: Contains information on actors and the films they’ve acted in.
tables.director: Lists directors and the movies they directed.
tables.genre: Defines genres such as comedy, action, or drama.
tables.movie_actor: Maps actors to their roles in movies.

inn_1.description: Tracks operations of an inn, including reservations, rooms, and guests.

tables.guest: Stores guest names and contact details.
tables.room: Lists available rooms and their characteristics.
tables.reservation: Tracks guest bookings and check-in/check-out dates.
tables.staff: Stores information about staff working at the inn.

insurance_and_eClaims.description: Handles insurance policyholders, claims, and adjusters for electronic claim processing.

tables.policyholder: Stores individual and company insurance policyholders.
tables.claim: Logs filed claims and their status.
tables.adjuster: Tracks employees responsible for claim assessments.

insurance_fnol.description: Tracks first notice of loss (FNOL) in insurance workflows.

tables.incident: Captures info on the loss event, such as date and location.
tables.report: Logs when the FNOL was reported and by whom.

insurance_policies.description: Tracks insurance policy details including coverage types and policyholders.

tables.policy: Stores policies including duration and coverage limits.
tables.customer: Contains policyholder details.
tables.coverage: Lists coverage types such as liability or collision.
tables.policy_coverage: Maps policies to the coverages they include.

journal_committee.description: Manages journal submissions, editorial committees, and reviews.

tables.journal: Stores journal names and publication schedules.
tables.review: Logs reviews submitted by editors for specific papers.

loan_1.description: Tracks loan applications, approvals, payments, and customers.

tables.customer: Contains information about people applying for loans.
tables.loan: Details the loan amount, interest rate, and term.

local_govt_and_lot.description: Models local government property management and land ownership.

tables.property: Stores land parcel records and values.
tables.owner: Tracks property owners and their shares.
tables.government_employee: Lists municipal workers managing property data.

local_govt_in_alabama.description: Captures local government structure and data specific to Alabama.

tables.county: Contains county names and regional info.
tables.official: Lists public officials and positions held.

local_govt_mdm.description: Tracks master data for a local government including projects, vendors, and approvals.

tables.project: Details government projects, their budgets, and timelines.
tables.vendor: Lists vendors contracted for public work.
tables.contract: Links vendors to awarded contracts and amounts.
tables.approval: Tracks administrative approvals tied to projects.

machine_repair.description: Tracks machinery repairs, maintenance logs, and technicians.

tables.machine: Stores machine IDs, types, and operational status.
tables.repair: Details repair events including dates and descriptions.
tables.technician: Lists technicians responsible for performing repairs.
tables.assignment: Links technicians to repair jobs and machines.

manufactory_1.description: Models a manufacturing company’s parts, suppliers, and product assembly process.

tables.part: Lists parts used in manufacturing, including codes and descriptions.
tables.product: Stores final products and their specifications.
tables.supplier: Contains supplier information for manufacturing parts.
tables.supply: Links suppliers to the parts they provide.
tables.assembly: Tracks which parts are used to assemble each product.

manufacturer.description: Tracks product manufacturing, including factories, materials, and costs.

tables.product: Contains manufactured products and their details.
tables.factory: Stores locations and names of manufacturing plants.
tables.material: Lists raw materials used in production.
tables.product_material: Links products to the materials they require.
tables.production: Logs product creation details including factory and quantity.

match_season.description: Stores match schedules and results across sports seasons.

tables.match: Details matchups including scores, dates, and teams.
tables.player: Tracks players and the teams they belong to.
tables.performance: Logs individual player performance in matches.

medicine_enzyme_interaction.description: Captures data on medicine and enzyme interactions for pharmaceutical analysis.

tables.medicine: Stores medicine names and chemical details.
tables.enzyme: Lists enzymes and their roles in drug processing.
tables.interaction: Logs known interactions between medicines and enzymes.

mountain_photos.description: Organizes photos taken in mountainous regions along with metadata.

tables.photo: Stores photos, filenames, and dates taken.
tables.photographer: Tracks people who took the photos.
tables.photo_mountain: Links photos to the mountains they were taken at.

movie_1.description: Tracks movie data including actors, directors, genres, and cast roles.

tables.movie: Contains movie titles, release years, and descriptions.
tables.actor: Lists actors and their personal info.
tables.cast: Links actors to movies and their roles.

museum_visit.description: Tracks museum visitor records, exhibits, and visits.

tables.exhibit: Lists exhibits featured in each museum.
tables.visit: Logs each visitor’s trip to the museum and what they viewed.

music_1.description: Tracks music albums, songs, artists, and listeners.

tables.album: Stores albums including title, release year, and artist.
tables.song: Contains songs and their associated albums.
tables.listener: Tracks listeners and the songs they’ve played.
tables.play: Logs play history between songs and listeners.

music_2.description: Models musical works, composers, and publishers.

tables.music: Contains musical pieces and their types.
tables.composer: Lists individuals who composed the music.
tables.publisher: Stores publishing companies for each composition.
tables.work: Links composers and publishers to specific pieces of music.

music_4.description: Tracks live performances, musical groups, and performance venues.

tables.performance: Tracks performances including date, location, and group.

musical.description: Covers musical productions, cast members, and performance schedules.

tables.musical: Stores musical production names and summaries.
tables.role: Tracks which actors play which roles in performances.

network_1.description: Models computer network infrastructure including devices and connections.

tables.connection: Tracks physical or wireless connections between devices.

network_2.description: Captures organizational network access rights and security settings.

tables.resource: Stores systems and files that users access.
tables.permission: Links users to the permissions they have for each resource.
tables.access_log: Logs user access to various resources.

news_report.description: Tracks news articles, journalists, and the topics they cover.

tables.article: Stores news headlines, bodies, and publication dates.
tables.journalist: Contains names and roles of reporters.
tables.topic: Defines categories or tags used in articles.
tables.article_topic: Maps articles to the topics they address.

orchestra.description: Tracks orchestral performances, musicians, instruments, and events.

tables.musician: Lists musicians, their instruments, and roles.
tables.instrument: Defines instrument types used in performances.
tables.performance: Tracks orchestral concerts with dates and venues.
tables.orchestra: Contains info about orchestra groups and members.

party_host.description: Tracks hosts, events, and party attendance details.

tables.host: Stores names and info about individuals who host parties.
tables.party: Details each party including date and location.
tables.guest: Contains information about people invited to parties.
tables.invitation: Links guests to parties and RSVP status.

party_people.description: Manages events, guests, and seating for social gatherings.

tables.seating: Maps guests to their assigned seats or tables.

performance_attendance.description: Tracks attendance at live performances, including ticket and audience data.

tables.performance: Stores concert or show names, locations, and dates.
tables.attendance: Links audience to performances they attended.

perpetrator.description: Stores criminal activity reports and suspected perpetrators.

tables.incident: Records criminal incidents including date and location.
tables.suspect: Contains suspected individuals and background info.
tables.investigation: Links suspects to incidents under investigation.

pets_1.description: Manages pet ownership and veterinary visits.

tables.pet: Stores animal info such as species and birth date.
tables.visit: Logs veterinary visits for each pet.
tables.veterinarian: Stores information on vets attending visits.

phone_1.description: Stores customer phone plan data and usage.

tables.customer: Contains names and phone numbers of customers.
tables.usage: Logs call, text, or data usage per customer.

phone_market.description: Tracks mobile phone models, brands, and sales figures.

tables.sale: Contains sales records including quantity and region.

pilot_record.description: Tracks pilots, certifications, and flight assignments.

tables.pilot: Stores pilot names and license information.
tables.aircraft: Contains aircraft data flown by pilots.
tables.flight_log: Records flights logged by each pilot.

poker_player.description: Tracks poker players, tournaments, and results.

tables.result: Links players to tournament placements and winnings.

product_catalog.description: Stores products, their descriptions, and availability.

tables.category: Defines categories each product belongs to.
tables.availability: Tracks product stock and location data.

products_for_hire.description: Manages rentable products, rental agreements, and customers.

tables.product: Contains rentable product info and terms.
tables.customer: Stores customers who rent products.
tables.rental: Links customers to the products they have rented.

products_gen_characteristics.description: Models products and their associated characteristics or features.

tables.product: Lists products including name and price.

program_share.description: Tracks television/radio programs and audience ratings.

tables.program: Contains names, types, and air times of shows.
tables.rating: Stores viewer or listener ratings for each program.

protein_institute.description: Captures protein-related research data including labs and researchers.

tables.lab: Stores research lab names and affiliations.
tables.experiment: Links proteins to experiments conducted in labs.

race_track.description: Manages car racing events, drivers, and tracks.

tables.race: Links drivers and tracks to race results and times.

railway.description: Tracks railway lines, stations, trains, and schedules.

tables.line: Stores train lines and their paths.
tables.schedule: Logs train arrival and departure times by station.

real_estate_properties.description: Tracks property listings, buyers, and agents.

tables.property: Lists homes, land, or buildings for sale.

restaurant_1.description: Manages restaurant tables, reservations, and waitstaff.

tables.table: Stores table IDs, capacities, and locations.
tables.waiter: Tracks restaurant staff assigned to tables.

restaurants.description: Tracks restaurant details, menus, and customer ratings.

tables.restaurant: Contains restaurant names, locations, and types.
tables.menu: Lists items available at each restaurant.
tables.rating: Stores reviews and star ratings by customers.

riding_club.description: Manages horse riding club members, horses, and lessons.

tables.member: Lists club members and their contact details.
tables.horse: Tracks horses used for lessons and competitions.
tables.lesson: Logs riding lesson details and assigned members.
tables.trainer: Contains riding instructors' names and certifications.

roller_coaster.description: Stores information about amusement park roller coasters.

tables.coaster: Contains coaster names, max speed, and height.
tables.coaster_park: Maps roller coasters to their parks.

sakila_1.description: A movie rental database similar to the Sakila schema, tracking films, customers, rentals, and staff.

tables.film: Stores film titles, lengths, and ratings.
tables.actor: Lists actors and their film roles.
tables.rental: Tracks film rentals and return dates.
tables.customer: Stores customer names and contact info.
tables.inventory: Links films to specific rental copies.
tables.store: Details physical store locations and staff.
tables.staff: Contains staff working at each store.

scholar.description: Tracks academic researchers, their publications, and affiliations.

tables.scholar: Contains personal and professional details about each researcher.
tables.publication: Stores titles and dates of published papers.
tables.institution: Lists academic institutions researchers belong to.
tables.authorship: Links scholars to the papers they've authored.

school_bus.description: Manages school bus routes, drivers, and student transportation.

tables.student: Lists students and their home addresses.
tables.bus: Stores bus IDs and capacity details.
tables.driver: Contains drivers and their license info.
tables.route: Maps bus routes and associated stops.
tables.assignment: Links students to specific bus routes.

school_finance.description: Tracks school-level budgeting and expenditure records.

tables.budget: Details allocated budgets per school and year.
tables.expenditure: Tracks how schools spend funds across categories.

school_player.description: Tracks school athletes, sports teams, and game statistics.

tables.player: Lists student athletes and their positions.
tables.team: Maps players to school sports teams.
tables.game: Logs match details including opponents and scores.

scientist_1.description: Tracks scientists, experiments, and lab affiliations.

tables.scientist: Stores researcher profiles and areas of study.
tables.lab: Lists labs where experiments are conducted.
tables.participation: Links scientists to the experiments they've worked on.

ship_1.description: Manages ship logs, routes, and crew information.

tables.ship: Stores ship names, types, and capacities.
tables.crew: Contains crew members and their positions.
tables.voyage: Logs ship trips with start and end dates.
tables.assignment: Links crew members to specific voyages.

ship_mission.description: Tracks naval missions, involved ships, and mission outcomes.

tables.mission: Stores mission objectives, dates, and locations.
tables.assignment: Links ships to missions they participated in.

shop_membership.description: Tracks store members, memberships, and rewards programs.

tables.member: Contains customer profiles and membership levels.
tables.purchase: Links members to purchases made under their accounts.

singer.description: Stores singer profiles, performances, and musical works.

tables.singer: Contains name, age, and country of each singer.
tables.song: Lists songs, genres, and release years.
tables.performance: Tracks singer performances including dates and venues.
tables.album: Links songs to albums they are part of.

small_bank_1.description: A small bank schema managing customer accounts, transactions, and branches.

tables.customer: Stores customer profiles and account IDs.
tables.account: Details account types, balances, and opening dates.
tables.branch: Contains bank branch locations and staff counts.

soccer_1.description: Stores data on soccer teams, players, matches, and statistics.

tables.team: Lists soccer team names, countries, and rankings.
tables.match: Tracks match scores, teams, and dates.
tables.goal: Logs goal scorers and minute scored in each match.

soccer_2.description: Tracks European soccer league players, clubs, and seasonal performance.

tables.club: Stores professional soccer clubs and their countries.
tables.player: Contains player bios and clubs played for.
tables.match: Records match outcomes including scores and referees.
tables.season: Defines soccer seasons and match schedules.

solvency_ii.description: A regulatory compliance database for insurance company solvency metrics.

tables.solvency_ratio: Tracks each company’s solvency ratio over time.
tables.violation: Logs solvency violations and regulatory actions.

sports_competition.description: Covers multi-sport competitions including athletes and event outcomes.

tables.athlete: Stores athlete names, countries, and sports.
tables.event: Lists events and categories within each sport.
tables.competition: Tracks competition names, dates, and locations.
tables.result: Logs event outcomes including winners and times.

station_weather.description: Tracks weather station readings across locations and times.

tables.station: Lists station names, IDs, and coordinates.
tables.reading: Records temperature, humidity, and other data over time.
tables.location: Links stations to their geographic regions.

store_1.description: A basic retail store database including products, customers, and sales.

tables.customer: Stores customers and their loyalty numbers.
tables.sale: Tracks product purchases including quantity and date.

store_product.description: Tracks inventory, product categories, and store locations.

tables.product: Stores product names, SKUs, and attributes.
tables.inventory: Tracks stock levels and reorder thresholds.
tables.store: Lists physical store locations and capacities.

storm_record.description: Stores historical data on storms, damages, and affected areas.

tables.storm: Records storm names, dates, and severity.
tables.damage: Details financial or structural damage from each storm.
tables.response: Tracks government or emergency responses to storm events.

student_1.description: A general university database tracking students, instructors, and course registrations.

tables.student: Stores personal info including major and start year.
tables.instructor: Lists faculty members and their departments.
tables.course: Contains course titles, codes, and credits.
tables.enrollment: Links students to the courses they are taking.

student_assessment.description: Models a student assessment system for courses and test scores.

tables.score: Links students to their scores for assessments.

student_transcripts_tracking.description: Tracks academic performance and transcripts of students over semesters.

tables.semester: Defines time periods for courses taken.
tables.course: Lists academic courses and credit values.
tables.transcript: Links students to course results and grades.

swimming.description: Tracks swimmers, competitions, event participation, and rankings.

tables.swimmer: Stores names, birthdates, and affiliations of swimmers.
tables.event: Lists swimming event types and distances.
tables.result: Links swimmers to their performance in events.

theme_gallery.description: Tracks themes and artwork displayed in a gallery setting.

tables.theme: Lists themes or concepts used in exhibitions.
tables.artwork: Contains artworks, their titles, and descriptions.
tables.theme_artwork: Maps themes to the artworks associated with them.

tracking_grants_for_research.description: Manages grant funding for research projects and participating organizations.

tables.grant: Stores grant names, amounts, and funding agencies.
tables.research_project: Lists funded research projects and their goals.
tables.grant_assignment: Links grants to the projects or organizations they support.

tracking_orders.description: Tracks customer orders, items, and delivery status.

tables.order: Stores order IDs, dates, and totals.
tables.customer: Contains information on individuals placing orders.
tables.order_item: Maps items to the orders they are part of.
tables.shipment: Tracks shipping details and delivery status.

tracking_share_transactions.description: Records share transactions, investors, and company equity.

tables.investor: Stores names and information of shareholders.
tables.company: Lists companies and their share details.
tables.transaction: Tracks share purchases and sales with dates.
tables.shareholding: Links investors to current shares held.

tracking_software_problems.description: Tracks reported bugs, software modules, and resolutions.

tables.problem: Stores descriptions of software issues and their severity.
tables.resolution: Tracks how and when issues were resolved.

train_station.description: Models train routes, stations, and schedules.

tables.station: Stores train station names and locations.
tables.train: Tracks trains and their route assignments.
tables.schedule: Details arrivals and departures at stations.

tvshow.description: Tracks television shows, cast members, and episodes.

tables.tv_show: Stores show names, genres, and run dates.
tables.actor: Contains cast members and character names.
tables.episode: Lists episode titles, air dates, and seasons.
tables.appearance: Links actors to their roles in specific shows or episodes.

twitter_1.description: Tracks users, tweets, and follower relationships in a social network.

tables.user: Contains user accounts and profile info.
tables.tweet: Stores tweets, timestamps, and user references.
tables.follower: Links users to the accounts they follow.

university_basketball.description: Tracks basketball teams, players, and tournament results at the university level.

tables.team: Lists basketball teams and their universities.
tables.player: Contains player stats and team affiliations.
tables.game: Details basketball games including scores and dates.

voter_1.description: Captures voter registration and voting history for local elections.

tables.voter: Stores voter names, IDs, and registration details.

voter_2.description: Extends voter data with polling locations and districts.

tables.vote: Links voters to where and when they voted.

wedding.description: Tracks weddings, invited guests, and ceremony logistics.

tables.wedding: Stores wedding events and couples' names.
tables.guest: Lists attendees and their RSVP status.
tables.ceremony: Details location and time for wedding ceremonies.
tables.gift: Tracks gifts received from each guest.

wine_1.description: Stores wine product data, including vineyards, reviews, and vintages.

tables.wine: Lists wine names, types, and years.
tables.vineyard: Contains info on vineyards and their regions.
tables.review: Stores reviews and ratings of wines.
tables.grape: Details types of grapes used in each wine.

workshop_paper.description: Tracks workshop papers, authors, and academic sessions.

tables.paper: Stores research paper titles and abstracts.
tables.author: Contains names and institutions of paper authors.
tables.session: Details sessions in which papers were presented.
tables.presentation: Maps papers to the sessions they were delivered in.

world_1.description: Captures geographical, political, and economic data of countries and cities.

tables.country: Stores country names, regions, and populations.
tables.city: Lists cities and their country associations.
tables.language: Tracks official and spoken languages per country.
tables.economy: Stores GDP, employment, and economic rankings.

tables.wrestler: Stores personal and performance data of wrestlers.
tables.match: Details wrestling matches, opponents, and results.
tables.title: Tracks championship belts and holders.

wta_1.description: Covers WTA tennis players, matches, and rankings.

tables.player: Lists female tennis players and their rankings.
tables.match: Details match results, dates, and locations.

yelp.description: Models Yelp-style business reviews, users, and business categories.

tables.user: Contains user profiles and activity data.
tables.review: Stores reviews, ratings, and dates per business.
